description:

Befriend cute characters, discover creative adventures, and customize your town in MySims and MySims Kingdom in MySims: Cozy Bundle.

#IGN #Gaming
title: MySims: Cozy Bundle - The First 15 Minutes of Gameplay

description:
Do you have someone special in your life who is getting into or loves Magic: The Gathering? Figuring out the perfect gift can be daunting, especially with so many options to choose from. Fret not, IGN's Seth Macy is here to help with his ultimate Holiday Gift Guide, featuring products for beginners and experts alike! From gifts to increase their collections like the Foundations Beginner's Box and Modern Horizons III Bundle with guaranteed foil hits, to gifts that will protect their precious cargo like Dragon Shield Matte Sleeves, Gamegenic Watchtower 100+ XL Convertible Deck box, and the behemoth of the Ultimate Guard Omnihive 1000+ Xenoskin. What would you add to the list? Let us know in the comments!

Presented by Magic: The Gathering

#IGN
title: Magic: The Gathering - Holiday Gift Guide

description:
The Yu-Gi-Oh! MASTER DUEL Shadow Duelist event is back with a new masked celebrity. Players competed in a tournament for the right to unmask Shadow Duelist Axle and claim their mask with a new twist! The winner of the tournament will be Dueling Axle in a best of 3 match!

The Shadow Duelist stream begins November 23rd at 3pm PT / 5pm ET / 10pm GMT with a recap of the Shadow Duelist tournament followed by the reveal of Axle’s secret identity.

#IGN
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! MASTER DUEL | Shadow Duelist Axle Reveal

description:
Welcome to Dream Productions, where Riley's dreams really do come true... on time and on budget! Check out the Dream Productions trailer for this upcoming four-episode limited series from Disney and Pixar Animation Studios. 

Taking place in between the events of “Inside Out” and “Inside Out 2” is Pixar Animation Studios’ “Dream Productions,” an all-new series about the studio inside Riley’s mind where dreams really do come true—every night, on time and on budget. Riley is growing up and when her memories need some extra processing, Joy and the rest of the Core Emotions send them to Dream Productions. Acclaimed director Paula Persimmon (voice of Paula Pell) faces a nightmare of her own: Trying to create the next hit dream after being paired up with Xeni (voice of Richard Ayoade), a smug daydream director looking to step up into the big leagues of night dreams. Also featuring the voices of Amy Poehler, Maya Rudolph, Ally Maki, Kensington Tallman, Liza Lapira, Tony Hale, Lewis Black an
title: Dream Productions - Official Trailer (2024) Amy Poehler, Maya Rudolph

description: Watch the Stellar Blade x Nier: Automata DLC launch trailer to see what you can expect from this collaboration with the action RPG. The Stellar Blade x Nier: Automata DLC is available now on PS5 (PlayStation 5).
title: Stellar Blade x Nier: Automata DLC - Official Launch Trailer

description:
Join director Dean DeBlois for a behind-the-scenes look at How To Train Your Dragon in this new featurette for the upcoming live-action reimagining of the film that launched the franchise. DeBlois discusses returning to the world of How to Train Your Dragon, casting choices for Hiccup and Astrid, and more. How to Train Your Dragon stars Mason Thames as Hiccup, Gerard Butler as Chief Stoick the Vast, Nico Parker as Astrid, and Nick Frost as Gobber. The film also stars Julian Dennison (Deadpool 2), Gabriel Howell (Bodies), Bronwyn James (Wicked), Harry Trevaldwyn (Smothered), Ruth Codd (The Midnight Club), BAFTA nominee Peter Serafinowicz (Guardians of the Galaxy) and Murray McArthur (Game of Thrones).

On the rugged isle of Berk, where Vikings and dragons have been bitter enemies for generations, Hiccup (Mason Thames; The Black Phone, For All Mankind) stands apart. The inventive yet overlooked son of Chief Stoick the Vast (Gerard Butler, reprising his voice role from the animated fran
title: How To Train Your Dragon - Official Behind-The-Scenes Clip (2025) Mason Thames, Nico Parker

description:
Stellar Blade and NieR: Automata have collaborated to being you a bunch of new outfits in this crossover DLC. We sift through all of them, try 'em on, and show them all off.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Stellar Blade X NieR: Automata Outfits Showcase on PS5 Pro (4K 60FPS)

description:
Not your average crew. Check out the new Star Wars: Skeleton Crew teaser trailer for this upcoming series starring Jude Law, Ravi Cabot-Conyers, Ryan Kiera Armstrong, Kyriana Kratter, Robert Timothy Smith, Tunde Adebimpe, Kerry Condon, and Nick Frost. The two-episode Skeleton Crew premiere is coming to Disney+ on December 3, 2024. 

Skeleton Crew follows the journey of four kids who make a mysterious discovery on their seemingly safe home planet, then get lost in a strange and dangerous galaxy, crossing paths with the likes of Jod Na Nawood, the mysterious character played by Law. Finding their way home—and meeting unlikely allies and enemies—will be a greater adventure than they ever imagined.

Star Wars: Skeleton Crew executive producers are Christopher Ford, Jon Watts, Jon Favreau, Dave Filoni, Kathleen Kennedy, and Colin Wilson and the co-executive producers are Chris Buongiorno, Karen Gilchrist, and Carrie Beck.

#IGN #StarWars
title: Star Wars: Skeleton Crew - Official Teaser Trailer (2024) Jude Law, Nick Frost

description:
As refresh rates, resolution and visual quality rise, the demand for high frame rates and low latency can become harder to achieve. But what does this mean for your in-game experience? We teamed up with PC builder Cyberpower, to put the tech to the test, pitting the GeForce RTX 4080 Super against the RTX 2070 GPU across a selection of high refresh rate titles. Sponsored by Cyberpower.
You can check out the PC build featured in this video and many others via the website https://www.cyberpowersystem.co.uk/category/gaming-pcs/nvidia/

#IGN
title: High Frame Rate and Low Latency PC Gaming - How does it work?

description:
Solo Leveling - ReAwakening - is coming to theaters Dec 6! Relive the thrill of Season 1 and catch an exclusive preview of what’s next in Season 2. Are you prepared to level up? 

Solo Leveling - ReAwakening - features a catch-up recap of the first season coupled with an exclusive sneak peek of the first two episodes of the highly anticipated second season in one momentous theatrical fan experience.

Over a decade has passed since a pathway called a "gate" which connects this world and another dimension suddenly appeared, and people with superhuman powers called "hunters" have been awakened. Hunters use their superhuman powers to conquer dungeons inside the gates to make a living, and Sung Jinwoo, a hunter of the lowest rank, is considered the Weakest Hunter of All Mankind. One day, he encounters a double dungeon, a high-level dungeon hidden inside a low-level one. In front of a severely wounded Jinwoo, a mysterious quest window pops up. On the verge of death, Jinwoo decides to take
title: Solo Leveling: ReAwakening - Official Trailer 2 (English Subtitles)

description:
From horror to cozy, action to strategy, and everything in between – The Mix kicks off the fall festivities with more games than ever for your wishlist. Dive into the newest digital gems this Thursday, November 21 at 9am PT to find out what you’ll be playing in the future.

title: The Mix 2024 Fall Showcase

description: Check out the trailer for Stardew Valley: Symphony of Seasons, the 2025-2026 live concert tour from SOHO Live featuring fresh arrangements of songs from the farming and life simulation RPG played by a 35-piece orchestra. The concert program is curated by developer Eric 'ConcernedApe' Barone.
title: Stardew Valley: Symphony of Seasons - Official 2025/'26 Tour Dates Announcement Trailer

description: Get your first look at gameplay from Taverna, an upcoming first-person multiplayer sandbox that the developer's co-founder describes as "VR Chat meets Garry's Mod with World of Warcraft vibes." In it, there are no NPCs, no quests; everything is completely player-driven. It's a "love letter to D&D and RPG fans" aiming to redefine the social multiplayer experience. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3219160/Taverna
title: Taverna - Official First Gameplay Trailer

description:
Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl is now available on PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, GOG), Xbox Game Pass, and Xbox Series X/S. Watch the Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl launch trailer for this first-person shooter survival horror game.

S.T.A.L.K.E.R. takes place in a fictional Chornobyl Exclusion Zone. The nuclear disaster at the Chernobyl Power Plant in 1986 wasn’t the only one to occur, as the second explosion hit the reactor in 2006, creating the Zone. It’s a dangerous place, filled with mutated creatures, deadly radiation, and a strange, anomalous energy.

Bounty hunters delve deep into the Zone, driven by its treasures and mysteries. Some of them are running from their past, others are blinded by money, and some are obsessed with finding the truth behind all the mysteries.

You will take the role of Skif - a lone stalker, who enters the Zone after a series of unforeseen events. On the way to the Heart of Chornobyl, you will gradually uncover the secrets of this world, explore the bala
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Official Launch Trailer

description:
Enjoy the new release date trailer for Astrometica, the upcoming first-person space-exploration, crafting, and survival game wrapped in narrative mystery that will drop for PC on December 10. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2353250/Astrometica/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Astrometica - Official Release Date Trailer

description:
It can be tough for a new Stalker the first time the visit the Zone, and while there's no substitute for experience, we can at least provide you with some tips on the things you should do first to make sure that you go into the Zone well prepared.

Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl is an intense, atmospheric first-person shooter survival horror game, and the release date is November 20, 2024 for Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, GOG).

#Stalker2 #Gaming #Games
title: Stalker 2 Heart of Chornobyl - 10 Things to Do First

description:
Welcome back, Stalker! Watch this Heart of Chornobyl gameplay for a look at the first 28 minutes of S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2. The long wait is finally over, with GSC Game World delivering the sequel we've been waiting for since the release of Shadow of Chernobyl, Clear Sky, and Call of Pripyat.

Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl is an intense, atmospheric first-person shooter survival horror game, and with the 'There and Back Again' prologue, you'll see our main character, Skiff, put to the test against anomalies, hunt artifacts, and go face to face against bandits, boars, bloodsuckers and other iconic Stalker enemies!

The Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl release date is November 20, 2024 for Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, GOG).

This gameplay was captured on PC at 4K 60FPS, with the EPIC overall quality settings, and DLSS set to Balanced mode. This is the PC config that was used to play:

ROG Strix Z690-F motherboard, i7 13700K CPU,  ASUS RTX 4090 ROG Strix 24GB GPU,
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - First 28 Minutes of Gameplay (4K 60FPS)

description:
Stalker 2 is a tough game, and it can take a long time to peel back some of its mechanics. Here's a quick video on how to fast travel in Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl.

S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2 (or just Stalker 2 if you're nasty) takes place in highly irradiated Chornobyl Exclusion Zone in Ukraine. You'll have to contend with mutants, anomalies, bandits, peacekeeping factions and more as you struggle to make your way across the wasteland.

The Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl release date is November 20, 2024 for Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, GOG).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - How to Fast Travel

description:
Check out this Heart of Chornobyl gameplay for a look at the first 28 minutes of S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2, played on the Xbox Series X, with the Quality Settings mode selected. Fans who enjoyed the STALKER: Legends of the Zone Trilogy, featuring Shadow of Chernobyl, Clear Sky, and Call of Pripyat, can now rejoice as Stalker 2 has finally made it to the Xbox Series X/S.

Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl is an intense, atmospheric first-person shooter survival horror game, and with the 'There and Back Again' prologue, you'll see our main character, Skiff, put to the test against anomalies, hunt artifacts, and go face to face against bandits, boars, bloodsuckers and other iconic Stalker enemies!

The Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl release date is November 20, 2024 for Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, GOG).

#Stalker2 #Gaming #Games
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - First 28 Minutes of Xbox Series X Gameplay

description:
Maui (Dwayne Johnson) makes an impressive entrance in this new Moana 2 clip.

Following an unexpected call from her ancestors, Moana must travel to Oceania and into long-lost waters in the upcoming animated sequel, Moana 2. Joined by Maui and a crew of unlikely seafarers, Moana embarks on a dangerous yet exciting new adventure.

Moana 2 debuts in US theaters on November 27 and in UK cinemas on November 29, 2024. The new Disney movie also features Auli‘i Cravalho, Khaleesi Lambert-Tsuda, Temuera Morrison, Rachel House, Nicole Scherzinger, Hualālai Chung, David Fane, Rose Matafeo, Awhimai Fraser, and Gerald Ramsey.

#Moana2 #Movies #Disney
title: Moana 2 - Official Clip (2024) Dwayne Johnson

description: From Lightspeed Studios and Square Enix comes Final Fantasy XIV Mobile, an adaptation of the critically acclaimed online role-playing game. This upcoming mobile game offers an exciting extension of the beloved franchise by capturing the immersive experience of the original title in a fresh, mobile-friendly format. Final Fantasy XIV Mobile is set to first launch in China, followed by a global release soon after.
title: Final Fantasy XIV Mobile - Announcement Trailer
Denzel Washington hijacks our Gladiator 2 interview
Live-action vs Animated Toothless

description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Xbox Game Pass Wave 2 for November has been announced, and there are some real bangers in this lineup. First up is the latest Flight Simulator game, Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024, which is available now. Next is the long-awaited S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl which arrives tomorrow, November 20th. Little Kitty, Big City hits the service the same day, and the following week sees Nine Sols and Aliens: Dark Descent. In other news, Sony is reportedly in talks with Japanese media company Kadokawa to add it to Sony's stable of subsidiaries. Kadokawa is known for publishing manga and anime, and also has several game studios under their umbrella, including Elden Ring developer FromSoftware. And finally, in a rare move win for business transparency, Remedy Entertainment has revealed how many copies of their upcoming games they need to sell to break even. The multiplayer-centric FBC: Firebreak needs to sell 3 million copies, and Control 2 needs 3-4 million. It's w
title: Xbox Game Pass Wave 2 for November 2024 Revealed - IGN Daily Fix
